body:
CREATE TABLE dbo.TableName$CURSOR$ (
    TableNameId                 int               NOT NULL IDENTITY(1, 1)
   ,FirstName                   nvarchar(100)     NOT NULL
   ,LastName                    nvarchar(100)     NOT NULL
   ,Suffix                      nvarchar(10)      NULL
   ,NickName                    nvarchar(100)     NULL
   ,UserName                    nvarchar(256)     NULL
   ,NormalizedUserName          AS (UPPER(ISNULL(UserName, ''))) PERSISTED NOT NULL
   ,SearchName                  AS (TRIM(CONCAT(ISNULL(TRIM(NickName) + ' ', ''), ISNULL(TRIM(FirstName) + ' ', ''), ISNULL(TRIM(LastName) + ' ', ''), ISNULL(TRIM(Suffix) + '', '')))) PERSISTED NOT NULL
   ,IsEmailAddressConfirmedFlag bit               NOT NULL CONSTRAINT TableName_IsEmailAddressConfirmedFlag_Default DEFAULT ((0))
   ,RowModifyPersonId           int               NOT NULL CONSTRAINT Person_RowModifyPerson FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES dbo.Person (PersonId)
   ,RowCreatePersonId           int               NOT NULL CONSTRAINT Person_RowCreatePerson FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES dbo.Person (PersonId)
   ,RowModifyTime               datetimeoffset(7) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT TableName_RowModifyTime_Default DEFAULT (SYSDATETIMEOFFSET())
   ,RowCreateTime               datetimeoffset(7) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT TableName_RowCreateTime_Default DEFAULT (SYSDATETIMEOFFSET())
   ,RowVersionStamp             rowversion        NOT NULL
   ,CONSTRAINT TableName_TableNameId PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (TableNameId ASC)
   ,INDEX TableName_RowModifyTableNameId NONCLUSTERED (RowModifyTableNameId ASC)
   ,INDEX TableName_RowCreateTableNameId NONCLUSTERED (RowCreateTableNameId ASC)
   ,INDEX TableName_SearchName NONCLUSTERED (SearchName ASC)
);
